openApiToRefitClient.description: Generates a client description for the Refit library

clientBaseInterface.description: The full name of the base interface.

interfaceAccessModifier.description: The client interface access modifier (default: public).

operationAsyncSuffix.description: Value indicating whether to append 'Async' suffix to the method name.

operationCancelationToken.description: Value indicating whether to add the cancellation token to the parameter list.

pathExtractExpression.description: The Regular expression for getting the operation path.

wrapQueryParmetersMethods.description: The list of methods where query parameters are wrapped ("ControllerName.MethodName", '*' may be used).

authorizationHeaderParameter.description: Value indicating whether to add the authorization header to the parameter list.

binaryPartType.description: The .NET type used for binary data (default: StreamPart).
